title: Instructional Design Workshop for Electronic Textbook Utilization and Learning Space Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage skills and secondary-level mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing the competency of practicing secondary mathematics teachers in utilizing smartphone-based digital textbooks and establishing innovative learning space strategies.

learning_goals: Participants can suggest three or more lesson design plans utilizing interactive features of digital textbooks (quiz generation, note sharing, etc.).
Participants can develop digital textbook application scenarios based on learner needs analysis results from surveys.
Participants can design and demonstrate an electronic textbook-based collaborative learning space model in a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
